name: should create a query for season projected stats
description: Test case for should create a query for season projected stats
expected_query: select "player"."pid", player.fname, player.lname, CASE WHEN rosters_players.slot = 13 THEN 'injured_reserve' WHEN rosters_players.slot = 12 THEN 'practice_squad' WHEN rosters_players.slot IS NULL THEN 'free_agent' ELSE 'active_roster' END AS player_league_roster_status, rosters_players.slot, rosters_players.tid, rosters_players.tag, "t1215d0d33b277649a224a322bc0a8678"."pts_added" AS "season_projected_points_added_0", "t3eac4f66cab58c4b1c8b5d2b3ab4eecd"."total" AS "season_projected_points_0", "tec118d5c0b35179ee21af0e28a8b6600"."py" AS "season_projected_pass_yds_0", "tec118d5c0b35179ee21af0e28a8b6600"."tdp" AS "season_projected_pass_tds_0", "tec118d5c0b35179ee21af0e28a8b6600"."ints" AS "season_projected_pass_ints_0", "tec118d5c0b35179ee21af0e28a8b6600"."ra" AS "season_projected_rush_atts_0", "tec118d5c0b35179ee21af0e28a8b6600"."ry" AS "season_projected_rush_yds_0", "tec118d5c0b35179ee21af0e28a8b6600"."tdr" AS "season_projected_rush_tds_0", "tec118d5c0b35179ee21af0e28a8b6600"."fuml" AS "season_projected_fumbles_lost_0", "tec118d5c0b35179ee21af0e28a8b6600"."trg" AS "season_projected_targets_0", "tec118d5c0b35179ee21af0e28a8b6600"."rec" AS "season_projected_recs_0", "tec118d5c0b35179ee21af0e28a8b6600"."recy" AS "season_projected_rec_yds_0", "tec118d5c0b35179ee21af0e28a8b6600"."tdrec" AS "season_projected_rec_tds_0", "player"."pos" from "player" left join "rosters_players" on "rosters_players"."pid" = "player"."pid" and "rosters_players"."year" = 2025 and "rosters_players"."week" = ${Math.min(constants.current_season.week, constants.current_season.finalWeek)} and "rosters_players"."lid" = 1 left join "league_format_player_projection_values" as "t1215d0d33b277649a224a322bc0a8678" on "t1215d0d33b277649a224a322bc0a8678"."pid" = "player"."pid" and "t1215d0d33b277649a224a322bc0a8678"."year" = 2025 and "t1215d0d33b277649a224a322bc0a8678"."week" = '0' and "t1215d0d33b277649a224a322bc0a8678"."league_format_hash" = 'a54416be9596b2a3dbdac2c5fd40d0bea908cd74b84e16416713bbaf45c6bfc5' left join "scoring_format_player_projection_points" as "t3eac4f66cab58c4b1c8b5d2b3ab4eecd" on "t3eac4f66cab58c4b1c8b5d2b3ab4eecd"."pid" = "player"."pid" and "t3eac4f66cab58c4b1c8b5d2b3ab4eecd"."year" = 2025 and "t3eac4f66cab58c4b1c8b5d2b3ab4eecd"."week" = '0' and "t3eac4f66cab58c4b1c8b5d2b3ab4eecd"."scoring_format_hash" = 'ad64bf40cdfec0a1ebdf66453fa57687832f7556f3870251c044d5d270fc089e' left join player.lname, rosters_players.slot, rosters_players.tid, rosters_players.tag, "t1215d0d33b277649a224a322bc0a8678"."pts_added", "t3eac4f66cab58c4b1c8b5d2b3ab4eecd"."total", "tec118d5c0b35179ee21af0e28a8b6600"."py", "tec118d5c0b35179ee21af0e28a8b6600"."tdp", "tec118d5c0b35179ee21af0e28a8b6600"."ints", "tec118d5c0b35179ee21af0e28a8b6600"."ra", "tec118d5c0b35179ee21af0e28a8b6600"."rec", "tec118d5c0b35179ee21af0e28a8b6600"."recy", "tec118d5c0b35179ee21af0e28a8b6600"."tdrec", "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos"
